JobTitle: Strategic Partner Manager, Entertainment Talent Partnerships
JobFullDesc: The Entertainment Talent Partnerships team is seeking a Strategic Partner Manager to scale, execute, and maintain partnerships with a portfolio of key Public Figure partners. This role is an important part of Facebook's Public Figure partnerships team. This individual will work with both internal and external stakeholders to implement strategic partnerships plans that help public figures build community and develop innovative experiences across the Facebook, Inc. family of apps. This role will combine high levels of strategic thought with expert execution. This person enthusiastic about handling all elements of partner management, from maintaining high-profile relationships to supporting day-to-day operations, such as fielding and prioritizing partner requests, troubleshooting partner issues, and using analytics to improve partner performance. A strong sense of prioritization and focus is required, as well as excellent relationship building skills and communication.   The Strategic Partner Manager's role will manage day-to-day needs of partner outreach programs, including data management, email outreach, and assisting and educating partnership prospects across the Entertainment Talent vertical.General program and partner management for the Entertainment Talent  team.
